1086920.name: Gallery in a Box
1086920.description:
I created a catalogue of 5 artists, by guiding the player through a virtual art gallery. During the experience each work of art is enhanced in some way, but without altering its identity. The experience is about 5 minutes long and is best experienced seated or standing with the audio turned up!

*************WHEN YOU RUN IT PRESS THE SPACE BAR TO CALIBRATE YOUR POSITION*************

****To close press ALT+F4****

The artists:

1. Rachel Ara
2. Jacek Ludwig Scarso
3. Ian Chamberlin
4. Nemo Nonnenmacher
5. Scarlet Mueller

Let me know what you think!

Cheers,
Felix
